column1: #text=I had just watched a movie , and saw that it had been based on a book .
#text=Since I liked the movie , I wanted to read the book and went to the library in my neighborhood to see if they had it .
#text=In the library the books were separated into fiction and non-fiction areas .
#text=Since the story was about something that happened in real life , it would be in the non-fiction area .
#text=If it were a make-believe story , it would have been in the fiction section .

#text=The person who wrote the book had a last name that began with S. I began looking on the shelves for authors with the last name that began with S. All the books were in alphabetical order according to the authors last name .
#text=I found the book I was looking for and took it off the shelf .
#text=I brought it to the desk where the librarian was and gave her the book .
#text=She asked me for my library card , which gives me permission to borrow books .
#text=She entered my information into her computer so she would know who borrowed the book .
#text=She told me the book would be due back in the library in two weeks .
#text=If I did n't bring it back by then , I would have to pay the library money for every day the book was late .
#text=I did n't want to have any late fees , so I made sure I brought it back on time .
#text=Since the book belonged to the library , I took good care of it so others could enjoy the book when they borrowed it .
